benefits.name: Ability Score Increase
effects: Increase your Dexterity or Constitution score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

benefits.name: Dash over Difficult Terrain
effects: When you take the Dash action on your turn, Difficult Terrain doesn't cost you extra movement for the rest of that turn.

benefits.name: Agile Movement
effects: Opportunity Attacks have Disadvantage against you.
